      • loaded

        protected void loaded(T t)
        This method will be called if the memoizer has loaded and stored the value t to memoize.
        Parameters:
        t - the new memoized value

      • delegate

        protected abstract com.google.common.base.Supplier<T> delegate()

      • isValid

        protected abstract boolean isValid(com.google.common.base.Optional<T> memoized)
        Check if given memoized value is valid.

        If this method returns false than the memoizer will update it's memoized value using delegate()

        Parameters:
        memoized - the current memoized value which is absent if the memoizer has not been initialized yet.
        Returns:
        true if the memoizer holds a valid value, false otherwise
